Quaqua 4.1 2007-11-25

Packages
ch.randelshofer.quaqua Provides fixes and enhancements for Apple's implementation of the Aqua Look and Feel.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.colorchooser Contains classes used by the QuaquaColorChooserUI.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.base64 Base64 is a Public Domain Java class providing very fast Base64 encoding and decoding in the form of convenience methods and input/output streams.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.ext.awt  
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.ext.awt.image Contains extensions to the java.awt.image package.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.ext.awt.image.codec.tiff  
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.ext.awt.image.codec.util  
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.ext.awt.image.renderable  
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.ext.awt.image.rendered  
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.i18n Provides utility classes for internationalization.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.util  
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.nanoxml NanoXML 2 Lite is a small non-validating parser for Java.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.filechooser Contains classes used by the QuaquaFileChooserUI.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.jaguar Contains look and feel classes that are specific to Mac OS X 10.2 Jaguar.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.jaguar.filechooser Contains classes to support the file system of Mac OS X 10.2 Jaguar from a JFileChooser.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.leopard Contains look and feel classes that are specific to Mac OS X 10.5 Leopard.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.leopard.filechooser Contains classes to support the file system of Mac OS X 10.5 Leopard from a JFileChooser.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.osx  
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.panther Contains look and feel classes that are specific to Mac OS X 10.3 Panther.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.panther.filechooser Contains classes to support the file system of Mac OS X 10.3 Panther from a JFileChooser.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.subset Contains subsets of the Quaqua Look and Feel.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.tiger Contains look and feel classes that are specific to Mac OS X 10.4 Tiger.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.tiger.filechooser Contains classes to support the file system of Mac OS X 10.4 Tiger from a JFileChooser.
ch.randelshofer.quaqua.util Contains utility classes which are used by the Quaqua Look and Feel.
